name: Setting of the Sun
description:
This low-poly story game was made over 12 weeks for my final assignment of my Bachelor's at the University of Canberra.

Note: All photos taken within the game can be found in the "GamePhotos" folder on your desktop! You are welcome to delete the folder if you don't want it.

Please be sure to set Graphics settings to your preference prior to playing, otherwise will automatically be set low.
